scholarships.name: Central Sector Scholarship (CSS)
scholarships.eligibility: Students who scored above 80th percentile and pursuing a regular degree course.
scholarships.income_criteria: Family income up to Rs. 4.5 lakh per annum.

scholarships.name: SBIF Asha Scholarship Programme
scholarships.eligibility: Postgraduate students from top 100 NIRF universities with 75% marks or above.
scholarships.income_criteria: Family income up to INR 6 lakh per annum.

scholarships.name: HDFC Bank Parivartanâ€™s ECSS Programme
scholarships.eligibility: Postgraduate students with 55% marks in the previous qualifying examination.
scholarships.income_criteria: Family income up to INR 2.5 lakh.

scholarships.name: CH Mohammed Koya Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: Muslim, Latin, and Converted Christian girls studying in the first year of graduation or higher courses.
scholarships.income_criteria: Family income up to Rs. 6 lakh per annum.

scholarships.name: Suvarna Jubilee Merit Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: First-year UG/PG students from BPL families with 50% marks or above.

scholarships.name: Post Metric Scholarship (PMS)
scholarships.eligibility: Students from minority communities with at least 50% marks.
scholarships.income_criteria: Family income up to Rs. 2.5 lakh per annum.

scholarships.name: Research Award
scholarships.eligibility: P.G./M.Phil/Ph.D students for pursuing short-term internships or projects.
